b:switch.b:if: That is AllEso es TodoIsso Tudo

b:if.cond: data:title != "{ads}" and not (data:widget.type == "HTML" and data:title contains "getMailchimp")

b:includable.b:tag: var templateifyMessages = { noTitle: "", viewAll: "", postAuthor: , postAuthorLabel: "", postDate: , postDateLabel: "" }

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "plexify-pro-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "plexify-pro-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

div.p: This gadget is no longer available.

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "ticker"))

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:includable.b:tag: var templateifyMessages = { noTitle: "", viewAll: "", postAuthor: , postAuthorLabel: "", postDate: , postDateLabel: "" }

b:include.cond: data:view.isMultipleItems and not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "plexify-pro-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "plexify-pro-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "plexify-pro-related-posts"))
b:section.name: Related Posts

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:widgets.Image any w => w.sectionId == "plexify-pro-about-section") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["footer-col-1","footer-col-2","footer-col-3"])
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["footer-col-1","footer-col-2","footer-col-3"])
